name: Pew Pew (CoolKid20041)
description:
A Cute Little Project I Decided to Work on Called Pew Pew (Because that's a very original name) Is a Little Run Around and Kill Enemies Type FPS. (First Person Shooter)

Pew Pew Isn't Finished At All Yet, It's Still In Alpha (If I'm Using That Term Correctly)

It Will Probably Be Finished When There's Like 30 Maps or so idk...

This was made using Unity's FPS Microgame, What i Basically Did was Make Multiple but Somewhat Unpolished Maps and Game Changes. There's Currently only Three Maps at launch, But A new map is added every week or so! Until I hit 10 maps, then i'm taking a break ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

Also this is my first "real" 3D Game i've ever made, So there might be a lot of Flaws, Glitches, Unpolished maps or Game play Mechanics, Etc.

Pew Pew is Free to Download (Obviously) Because it isn't Finished Yet, But i'll Keep It Free Even When It's Finished ; )

This Game Should Run on Basically Anything, But if You're Unsure Then Here Are Some Specs:

Minimal:

2.0 GHz Processor (Or Intel Pentium)

2 Gigs of Ram

At Least 150 Mb Of Free Space

Recommended:

2.6 GHz Processor (Or Intel Core i3, i5)

4 Gigs of Ram

500 Mb to 1 Gb Of Free Space

And A Decent Graphics Card (idk a lot of specs when it comes to gpu's)

AMD Cpu's Should Also Work Obviously

This Game is Only Available for Windows (At The Moment) But I'll Try to Port It To Other Platforms (Like Mobile!)
